A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was 36 days old when Star Wars began in 1977 and it’s been a huge part of my life ever since. I absolutely loved The Last Jedi. So much heart\, so much humor\, incredible action sequences\, and many wonderful surprises. I was on the edge of my seat during the entire movie with a big grin on my face and the occasional tear in my eye. It had so many twists and didn’t stick to any preconceived formula. I really don’t understand the backlash that this amazing movie is getting from ‘fans’. The truth is that nothing will ever match the magic that the originals had for those of us that grew up on it. But I for one am so happy for this next generation of movie goers that get to experience this new trilogy and all upcoming Star Wars movies. I’m about to go see it again and I can’t wait.
